ygData.subject: Re: Hello Again
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually Pslam of Warmth is NOT a stinker, it is a great song.  An undocumented feature of the song is that it provides a group damage shield (starts at 5
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>Subject: [eqbards] Hello Again
>Date: Thu, 26 Aug 1999 09:40:04 -0500
>
>I have not been able to really particiapate iin the list for a while as I
>was switching jobs etc. Got to be unemployed for a couple of weeks and as a
>result Tszaaz went from about level 17 to 21 *laughs* Currently I am level
>23. NO MORE POWERLEVELING! I am just going to enjoy it for a while, the
>next
>two songs (see invis and psalm of warmth) are stinkers anyway,so no big
>hurry.

Actually Pslam of Warmth is NOT a stinker, it is a great song. An
undocumented feature of the song is that it provides a group damage shield
(starts at 5 damage). The damage shield stacks with all other shields
(except cold based ones I have been told). If you think a 5 point damage
shield is not significant in your next group battle count the number of
times the mobs hit anyone in your party and multiply by 5 :) Also see
invisibility is great for spotting cloaked kill stealers, and it give
ultravision for the blind humans in the group.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
